 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָלַף‎</span> **verb** ==twist, pervert, overturn== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְלַף‎</span> ***twist*** (rare); Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is ***pass, pass away, come to naught*** [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>1407 f.</sup>); — 

**Pi\`el** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְסַלֵּף‎</span> [[Job.12.19|Job 12:19]] + 2 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְסַלֵּף‎</span> [[Prov.22.12|Prov 22:12]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּסַלֵּף‎</span> [[Prov.13.6|Prov 13:6]]; [[Prov.19.3|Prov 19:3]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְסַלֵּף‎</span> [[Prov.21.12|Prov 21:12]] — 

**1.** ***pervert***, [[Exod.23.8|Exod 23:8]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) a bribe ***perverteth*** the case (cause, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דִּבְרֵי‎</span>) of righteous, = [[Deut.16.19|Deut 16:19]]. 

**2.** ***subvert, turn upside down, ruin*** (only Wisdom Literature): with accusative of person [[Job.12.19|Job 12:19]]; [[Prov.13.6|Prov 13:6]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּצֹּר‎</span>), [[Prov.21.12|Prov 21:12]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִוֶּלֶת אָדָם תּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דַּרְכּוֺ‎</span> [[Prov.19.3|Prov 19:3]] ***a man's folly subverteth his way***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְסַלֵּף דִּבְרֵי בֹגֵד‎</span> [[Prov.22.12|Prov 22:12]] ***and he*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>) ***subverteth the affairs of a treacherous*** man.
